missionstate.description: You have been sent to find Benjis stolen ship building plans.
You have found Benjis plans and returned them!

Hello there stranger. Might you do a quest for me? I obviously cannot get out of here. 
Excellent, you can:
 Kill: 
15 Skeleton 

Collect: 
12 Bat Wings

mission.name: Search & destroy
mission.description:
Kill: 
10 Carrion Worms 

Collect: 
10 Carrion Worm Fang

mission.name: Complete
mission.description: You have completed this quest

missionstate.description: Collect: 12 Little Black Books, 10 Red Cloths, 1 Red Rose | Kill: 20 Heros

mission.name: Vengeance: Cyclops
mission.description:
Great, for your first quest you need to collect some items, I need. 

Collect: 
10 Cyclops Toes

mission.name: Vengeance: Hatchlings
mission.description:
Thanks, for your next quest kill.

Kill: 
20 Dragon Lord Hatchling 
20 Dragon Hatchling

mission.name: Vengeance: Dragons
mission.description:
Now that you've taken care of those pesky hatchlings. Go kill some dragons and bring me..

Collect: 
40 Green Dragon Leather 
40 Green Dragon Scales

mission.name: Vengeance: Vampires
mission.description:
Good job, now kill off those damned blood suckers and bring me: 

Collect: 
20 Vampire Teeth 
20 Blood Preservation

mission.name: Vengeance: Dragon Lords
mission.description:
Good, there are a few more items you need to get. 

Collect: 
40 Red Dragon Leather 
40 Red Dragon Scales

mission.name: Vengeance: Stormblast
mission.description:
Good job, now rid us of.. 

Kill: 
Stormblast

mission.name: Vengeance: Complete
mission.description: You have completed Soraya's Vengeance. Thank you for playing with us on Decapitated Soul.

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Hydra
mission.description:
For your first stop, use the gargoyle statue just above Riona. Make your way to Queimada.

Kill: 
100 Hydra 

Collect: 
40 Hydra Head 
40 Hydra Tongues

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Demodras
mission.description:
Ok, next you will have to pass beyond the dragons of Droghead to...

Kill: 
100 Demodras 

Collect: 
50 Dragon Tears

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Sorcerer Genocide
mission.description:
Within the Queimada forests, you will find a circle of casting. Use this to..

Kill: 
100 Warlocks 
50 Infernalists 
50 Fury 

Collect: 
20 Luminous Orb 
20 Magic Sulphur

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Venture Into The Underworld
mission.description:
The figures from the past stand tall. 

 Kill: 
100 Lost Souls 
20 Dark Torturers 

 Collect: 
40 Unholy Bones 
5 Cat's Paws

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Demon
mission.description:
Time to face your fears. Infernal punishments must pursue. 

Kill: 
100 Demons 

Collect: 
40 Demon Dust 
40 Demon Horn 
40 Talon

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Orshabaal
mission.description:
Like the Bermuda Triangle, she swallows her victims whole. 

Kill: 
50 Orshabaal 

Collect: 
20 Mangled Hands

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Juggernaut
mission.description:
I Have Suffered For Your Sins, But Now Is When The Fun Begins. 

Kill: 
50 Juggernauts 

Collect: 
20 Juggernaut Teeth

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Ghastly Dragon
mission.description:
We venture now to Alexandria, a land of rebellion. 

Kill: 
50 Ghastly Dragons 

Collect: 
20 Broken halbert 
20 Undead Hearts

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Frost Dragon
mission.description:
Your time has come. Venture deep into the Frozen Wastes.

Kill: 
50 Frost Dragons 

Collect: 
20 Frosty Hearts

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Enter Frozen Hell
mission.description:
Your soul is now intune with the evil at hand. Time to face your greatest fears. Make your way deep into the Frozen Wastes. The labyrinth awaits! 

Kill: 
20 Soul Reapers 
1 Angel of Death

mission.name: Reign of Terror: Enter Frozen Hell
mission.description: Congratulations on your completion of my quest chain. I have brought you through Hell and back. Thank you for taking the time to take the adventures presented to you! ~ Caduceus
